name: Top Down Shooter Test (Xtrofik)
description:
A simple top down shooter built for core gameplay testing in a different game I am working on. 

Key features include 360-degree character walk/strafe movement, camera rotation/distance aiming, and ray-traced bullet movement collision checking.

The art is very crude and there is no sound. It's made only to get the idea across. Feel free to download the .exe from the link below and give it a try and let me know what you think!

Controls: 

W,A,S,D = Player Walk/Strafe 

Mouse x= Aim Angle 

Mouse y= Aim Distance 

Mouse Left = Shoot 

R = Restart 

Escape = Show/Hide Mouse
